title: The Ayaneo 2S gaming handheld hits crowdfunding, but one factor could make it fail
description: The Ayaneo 2S has started its crowdfunding campaign and is already seeing major success, but pricing could be its downfall.

title: Apple planned to add color to AirPods –and I wish it had
description: Apple's AirPods apparently had 5 additional hue options, but the company backed out of the scheme at the last minute.

title: WhatsApp beta on Android introduces screen-sharing - here's how to enable it
description: Be aware the new screen-sharing may have some limitations such as incompatibility with older versions of Android OS.

description: The Asus PC gaming handheld has received several firmware updates, and they have increased gaming performance by a noticeable degree.

description: Cooler Master unveiled a whole lot of products at this year's Computex event, some are hits and some are just... odd.

title: PyPI brings in mandatory 2FA for all software publishers following recent security issues
description: PyPI is giving project and organization maintainers until the end of this year to turn on two-factor authentication.

title: Predator malware might be worse than previously though
description: Cisco Talos experts argue the tool has additional functionalities that allow for extensive espionage.

title: The iPhone and Galaxy S23 Ultra prove money is no object for smartphone buyers
description: New research shows buyers want the biggest and best smartphones, with Apple and Samsung’s champs the big winners.

title: Microsoft extends some vital security protection to Arm devices

title: Zip domains are being abused again to trick victims into a phishing scam
description: Researchers found a clever way to abuse new domains to steal credentials and deliver malware.

title: Top tire manufacturer hit by data breach leaking info on millions of customers
description: Unsecured SimpleTire database leaked around 1TB of customer data online.

title: Final Fantasy 16’s endgame is more than your average new game plus
description: From new game modes to special trials, Final Fantasy 16’s endgame content isn’t for the faint of heart.

title: Millions of top US dental firm customers have data leaked after ransomware attack - what to do if you're affected
description: LockBit claimed the attack, demanding $10 million in exchange for keeping the data private.

title: MSI wants to build your next work laptop

title: iFi's iCan Phantom is a beast of a headphone amp for the fussiest of cans
description: iCan Phantom is actually quite compact despite its dual-level design – and iFi says it handles everything from hyper-sensitive IEMs to the most power-hungry headphones with aplomb.
